org.forgerock.openidm.servlet.internal

Class ServletComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.servlet.internal.ServletComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.service.event.EventHandler

    public class ServletComponent
extends Object
implements org.osgi.service.event.EventHandler
    A component to create and register the "API" Servlet; that is, the CHF Servlet that 1) listens on /openidm, 2) dispatches to the HttpApplication, that is composed of a) the auth filter b) the JSON resource HTTP Handler, that i) converts CHF Requests to CREST requests, and ii) routes them on the CREST router using the external ConnectionFactory.
